document_data.name: Skult
document_data.mainbody: '''Skult''' was a thief from [[Cormyr]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Skult was a thief for hire, who avoided stealing from noblemen. Most of the time, he and another were hired by noblemen to steal from creditors, trade rivals, or those for whom they bore a grudge.
document_data.Relationships: Skult was often mentioned together with [[Vandarl]], with whom he was teamed up; the duo was sometimes referred to as "Skull and Van".
document_data.Rumors & Legends: During the [[Open Feast]] of {{yearlink|1479}} in [[Castle Obarskyr]], [[Cormyr]], the topic of Skult and Vandarl was brought during a reception in which a diplomatic envoy from [[Melvarune]] participated. They were compared and contrasted with the [[Silent Shadow]].
